page.title: 11KENNEDY HALL DUNURE (1)
page.content: Kennedy Hall serves as meeting place for most social activities namely Play Group - 10 members catering for children 3 years to school age meeting 2 mornings weekly.Brownie Pack - 12 members meet weekly and hold Daffodil Tea each spring.Sunday School 23 pupils divided into 3 age groups with 3 teachers.Last Sunday in month they join Church service.Youth Club member ship of 10 meet one evening weekly, sometimes travelling to other Clubs or outside entertainment.There are 26 members in Carpet Bowling Club.All over 18 years may join and play on Tuesday afternoon or Friday evening. The WVS run Evergreen Club for 40 Senior Citizens providing them with tea and entertainment every Wednesday afternoon most being conveyed to and from Hall by Social Services bus.They also have an annual outing.
